songs.title: Lovin U
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ohh
Yeah, let me, let me try something real quick

[Verse 1]
If I gave you forever
Would you take care of me?
Would you take me for granted?
Run away

[Pre-Chorus]
Those wonderful things that you do
They've got me feeling in love with you
In love with you

[Chorus]
Lovin' u is easy
Comes so naturally
Lovin' u is easy
Comes so naturally

[Verse 2]
I would give you laughter
Oh, so much more than that (oh yes, I would)
Anything you're after
I will climb the highest mountain, to bring it back
You'd better believe

[Pre-Chorus]
Those wonderful things that you do
They've got me feeling in love with you
In love with you

[Chorus]
Lovin' u is easy
Comes so naturally
Lovin' u is easy
Comes so naturally

[Bridge]
I will stay by your side
Whether I'm wrong, whether I'm right
Oh, it's incredible
With you, I intend to spend the rest of my life
Yeah, yeah, yeah

[Chorus]
Lovin' u is easy
Comes so, it comes so naturally
Lovin' u is easy
Comes so, so, it comes so naturally

[Outro]
Lovin' u is easy
So easy
Lovin' u is easy
It comes so naturally
Lovin' u is easy
Lovin' u is easy (I'm in love with you forever)
It comes so naturally
Lovin' u is easy
